definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: I'llgo and talk with my adviser.
sentences.chinese: 我要去和我的顧問商議。

sentences.english: Member countries and dialogue partners discuss measures to enhance peace in the region.
sentences.chinese: 各成員國和對話夥伴共同商議增進本地區和平的措施。

sentences.english: They decided to settle their debts with their creditors, and call it quits.
sentences.chinese: 他們商議決定以資抵債，兩下扯平。

sentences.english: He summoned his subordinates hastily to his office.
sentences.chinese: 他急忙召喚他的下級去他的辦公室商議。

sentences.english: Just about this moment the scouts came to report that Cao Cao’s army had reached Bowang.
sentences.chinese: 正商議間，探馬飛報曹兵已到博望了。

sentences.english: One night, Zhou Yu was thinking hard in his tent about how to defeat Cao Cao's army, when Huang Gai came in .
sentences.chinese: 一日深夜，老將黃蓋來到帳中，商議破曹以火攻爲好。

sentences.english: She would like to exchange information with Du Ziyuan to discuss the solution.
sentences.chinese: 她很想和杜自遠交換一下情況，商議解決措施。

sentences.english: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death;
sentences.chinese: 但祭司長商議連拉撒路也要殺了。

sentences.english: I shall advise with my friends.
sentences.chinese: 我將和我的朋友們商議。

sentences.english: After two people negotiate good, only wait for action in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 兩人商議好後，只等晚上行動。

sentences.english: The next day, cheng bite gold etc are counsel how to take over the unique to the site.
sentences.chinese: 隔天，程咬金等人正在商議如何接管瞿讓的地盤。

sentences.english: The insult to the adult consulter results in multiplication of the faulty faucets.
sentences.chinese: 對成年人的商議者的侮辱導致有故障的水龍頭的乘法。

sentences.english: The insult to the adult consulter results in multipmultiplication of the faulty faucets.
sentences.chinese: 對成年人的商議者的侮辱導致有故障的水龍頭的乘法。

sentences.english: TCP negotiates a session for data transfer between hosts.
sentences.chinese: 傳輸控制協議爲數據在主人之間的移動商議期間。

sentences.english: 11But they were furious and began to discuss with one another what they might do to Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 他們就滿心大怒，彼此商議怎樣處治耶穌。

sentences.english: The west chamber was the place where the emperor read report, signed documents and discussed military and political affairs with his officials.
sentences.chinese: 西殿是皇帝批閱公文及與官員們商議軍政大事的地方。

definition: to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
to hold a meeting/to attend a meeting
to confer/to discuss/to engage in talks
to report/to give an account of/to collect information and report back
